project(libblas)

set(BLAS_ROOT ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/cblas)

        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztbsv.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztpmv.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztpsv.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztrmm.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztrmv.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztrsm.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/cblas_ztrsv.c
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/src/xerbla.c
        )

add_library(libblas SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(libblas PUBLIC
        ${BLAS_ROOT}/include
        )
target_link_libraries(libblas
        libF77blas
        )
